titleStmt.title: A letter from an English officer in His Majesty's Army in Ireland. Giving a true account of the progress of affairs in that kingdom: together with what past at the surrender of Waterford and Duncannon. And of his Majesties march towards Limmerick. Dated July 29. 1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Baldwin in the Old-Bailey,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
